news.title: Welcome to All The Tools!
news.message: Thanks for signing up. Your account is ready — explore our growing library of tools for text, images, calculations, and more.

news.title: New Tool: On-Reward Scanner
news.message: We've just launched the On-Reward Scanner under OCR Tools. Upload a receipt image and extract reward points automatically.

news.title: Scheduled Maintenance — Feb 20
news.message: We'll be performing server maintenance on February 20th from 2:00–4:00 AM UTC. Some tools may be temporarily unavailable during this window.

news.title: Profile & Account Page Launched
news.message: You can now manage your account preferences, view news & updates, and log out from a single place. Visit /account anytime.

news.title: Bug Fix: ASCII Character Reference
news.message: Fixed an issue where copying certain control characters from the ASCII grid would paste incorrect values in some browsers. All copy functions now work correctly.
